caption.p: Macroscopical view of mice liver and kidney ( A) and histological sections of liver and kidney from the acute toxicity test ( B). No significant differences in the structure of liver and kidney between treated and control groups (Hematoxylin & Eosin stain). Magnification: a, b and c, ×10; d, e, f and h ×40. Data are represented as x ± s ( n = 6).
